segments.text: My gaze shifts to the other side of the kitchen where the children are.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I observe a boy climbing on a two-step stool in front of the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching up towards an open cabinet door.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, I can clearly see a large jar labeled “COOKIE JAR” filled with delicious-looking cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of his hands is already inside the jar, grabbing something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: With his other hand, he's holding a plate, perhaps to catch his illicit treasures.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the stool is terribly unstable; its legs are splayed, and it looks like it's about to tip backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This makes me quite fearful for his safety.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way he's stretched upward seems very precarious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm surprised he hasn't lost his balance yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His focus is entirely on those cookies, not on his footing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl nearby is watching him intently, her hand raised.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are quite a mischievous pair.
segments.speaker: PAR
